solution_line_template: There are {boys_second_grade} + {girls_second_grade} = <<{boys_second_grade}+{girls_second_grade}={students_second_grade}>>{students_second_grade} students in second grade.
There are {students_second_grade} x {multiplier_third_grade} = <<{students_second_grade}*{multiplier_third_grade}={students_third_grade}>>{students_third_grade} students in third grade.
